title: ICE: attempt to add with overflow', src/librustc_errors/emitter.rs:128:29

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: T-bootstrap
labels.description: Relevant to the bootstrap subteam: Rust's build system (x.py and src/bootstrap)

labels.name: E-needs-mcve
labels.description: Call for participation: This issue needs a Minimal Complete and Verifiable Example

body:
rustc build config ````toml [llvm] release-debuginfo = true assertions = true ninja = true targets = "AArch64;ARM;Hexagon;MSP430;Mips;NVPTX;PowerPC;RISCV;Sparc;SystemZ;WebAssembly;X86" link-jobs = 2 [build] extended = true tools = ["cargo", "rls", "clippy", "rustfmt", "analysis", "src"] sanitizers = false profiler = true [install] [rust] debug = true codegen-units = 0 debug-assertions = true debuginfo-level = 1 backtrace-on-ice = true verify-llvm-ir = true [target.x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu] ar = "llvm-ar" ranlib = "llvm-ranlib" [dist] ```` When I use the resulting rustc and run my crashfinder which runs `RUST_BACKTRACE=full "build/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/stage2/bin/rustc" "./src/librustc_ast_lowering/pat.rs" "-Zmir-opt-level=3" "--emit" "mir" "-Zsave-analysis" "-o" "/dev/null" "-Zdump-mir-dir=/dev/null"` I get the following crash: ```` ... --> ./src/librustc_ast_lowering/lib.rs:1054:25 | 1054 | ExpnId::root(), | ^^^^^^ use of undeclared type or module `ExpnId` thread 'rustc' panicked at 'attempt to add with overflow', src/librustc_errors/emitter.rs:128:29 stack backtrace: ```` However I have not managed to reproduce this by executing the command in the command line for some reason :/ ### Meta rustc is @ 75b0a68f35a06fc7aed8aa95831df8eace4afffb
Backtrace

``` error[E0433]: failed to resolve: use of undeclared type or module `AssocTyConstraintKind` --> ./src/librustc_ast_lowering/lib.rs:1003:13 | 1003 | AssocTyConstraintKind::Bound { ref bounds } => { | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ use of undeclared type or module `AssocTyConstraintKind` error[E0433]: failed to resolve: use of undeclared type or module `DefPathData` --> ./src/librustc_ast_lowering/lib.rs:1053:25 | 1053 | DefPathData::ImplTrait, | ^^^^^^^^^^^ use of undeclared type or module `DefPathData` error[E0433]: failed to resolve: use of undeclared type or module `ExpnId` --> ./src/librustc_ast_lowering/lib.rs:1054:25 | 1054 | ExpnId::root(), | ^^^^^^ use of undeclared type or module `ExpnId` thread 'rustc' panicked at 'attempt to add with overflow', src/librustc_errors/emitter.rs:128:29 stack backtrace: 0: 0x7fba006bc048 -
